Posts.Content: Hi Carol Pleae enjoy you few weeks away I hope you have a great time. I am living on panadol for the pain my breast is so sore they never said that the radiation would have side effects that would last this long. I have worked out that every time I have severe pain I get the hot flases as well even though I am not on the tamoxifen.this is what is was like when I was on Radiation treatment.anyway you have a good rest let me know how you go lots of luck & god bless. molly. hopefully this time my name will stay the same
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi Carol what a life saver you are I have never heard of the massage technique I will start right away.are you gong to do any touring while you are away.Sometimes its nice toget away we came back from Bangkok a few weeks ago It was nice to get away from the normal routine do enjoy your break take care molly
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi Lisa thank you for replying I was hoping that the hot flashes were not my own body but a side effect of the radiation & tamoxifen thank you for leting me know about the time lapse. I too feel that quality of life is important Its frightening to be so unsure of the decisions we are making with gods blessing we have made the right decision we should call ourselves the three musketeers have a great day Lisa

Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi Carol I know you feel really uncomfortable with the radiation treatment. I would much prefer radiation than losing my breast. Funny when I was in my twenties I believed that breast cancer could be the worse thing to happen to me as I dont think I could cope with losing a breast. Now I am grateful that treatment now allows some of us cancer patients to keep our breasts I am gong to find the Indol 3 you were taking I have been off the tamoxifen for a week the hot flashes are still happening though not as strong I believe the tamoxifen has pushed me permently into the change obviously I was on the border as I have never had the hot flashes until I started treatment.as yoy can see I had trouble logging on again now molly4 lots of luck have a good weekend
